entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Primary ctor parameter writes should be assumed necessary even if not read later in the method #68904
  • VisualBasicUseCollectionInitializerDiagnosticAnalyzer fails with ArgumentOutOfRangeException #68899
  • CS0111 error upon rebuild #68895

Closed

  • Test plan for "file types" #60819
    17.7
  • Rules to help with conflicts between Primary Constructor parameters and field style rules #68743
  • Cover and covering And Cover #68898
  • Compiler crashes when attempting to compile string interpolation concatenation with parentheses applied #68834
    17.8
  • Collection literal parsing doesn't handle a few cases well/properly. #68766
    C# 12.0
  • "foreach (ref read)" causes an assert in assertBindIdentifierTargets for the "read" identifier #68782
    17.7

PullRequests

Created

  • Move to using primary constructors. #68907
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Moving lexing functions out of SlidingTextWindow #68906
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce memory consumption around SpellChecker object creation/usage. #68905
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add fuzzer for incremental generators #68903
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Don't hardcode C# 9 in function pointer tests #68902
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add filePath when generates new Document in MoveTypeEditor #68900
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • External Access EditorConfig generation #68896
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Gracefully handle exceptions from DiagnosticSuppressor.SupportedSuppressions in IDE #68894
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add effective severities custom property array to error log #68892
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement simple LSP run tests #68889
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Share implementation code for xml-doc close-tag completion between C# and VB #68901
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use primary constructors in features layer #68897
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix crash in interpolation handling #68845
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Update to 17.7.58 #68890
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Merge features/CollectionLiterals into Main #68886
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify and make consistent query-context tracking in the parser #68757
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • BindRefExpression - bind expression in error recovery mode. #68887
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add support for `System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.ExperimentalAttribute` #68702
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Disallow applying `RequiresLocation` and `Out` attributes to `ref readonly` parameters in source #68871
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Filter `RequiresLocationAttribute` from `ref readonly` parameters #68870
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Avoid quadratic lookup of namespace declarations #68832
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Update Compiler Breaking Changes - post VS2019.md #68674
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • [Infra] Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Testing to 1.1.2-beta1.23323.1 #68888
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement "extension invocation" section for methods #68629
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, C# 12.0
  • Add EA package for the compiler developer SDK #68628
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid loading Roslyn through All In One Search when Roslyn isn't loaded yet. #68644
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Check ReturnsVoidIsSetBit flag #68846
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix ordering issue in analyzer callbacks for nested actions in symbol start analyzers #68490
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
